name: Trae Young
comment: Dec 20: Young (heel) is questionable for Saturday's game against the Grizzlies, Brad Rowland of the Locked On Podcast Network reports.

name: Onyeka Okongwu
comment: Dec 18: Okongwu is dealing with left knee inflammation and will miss at least four games, NBA writer Marc Stein reports. The big man will be re-evaluated in approximately one week.

name: Kobe Bufkin
comment: Dec 18: Bufkin will miss the remainder of the 2024-25 season as he undergoes surgery to address his right shoulder instability, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Cody Zeller
comment: Dec 10: Zeller (personal) won't play in Wednesday's game versus the Knicks, Kevin Chouinard of the Hawks' official site reports.
